content:
TaskDependencies TaskDependencies Class

In this Article

Edit

Specifies any dependencies of a task. Any task that is explicitly specified or within a dependency range must complete before the dependant task will be scheduled.

Syntax

Declaration

public class TaskDependencies : ITransportObjectProvider<TaskDependencies>, IPropertyMetadata, IModifiable, IReadOnlyPublic Class TaskDependencies
    Implements ITransportObjectProvider(Of TaskDependencies), IPropertyMetadata, IModifiable, IReadOnly

Constructors

  • Edit
    TaskDependencies(IEnumerable<String>, IEnumerable<TaskIdRange>)
    TaskDependencies(IEnumerable(Of String), IEnumerable(Of TaskIdRange))

    Initializes a new instance of the TaskDependencies class.

    public TaskDependencies(IEnumerable<string> taskIds, IEnumerable<TaskIdRange> taskIdRanges)Public Sub New(taskIds As IEnumerable(Of String), taskIdRanges As IEnumerable(Of TaskIdRange))

    Parameters

    • taskIds
      IEnumerable<String>
      IEnumerable(Of String)

      The list of task ids that must complete before this task can be scheduled. null is treated as an empty list.

    • taskIdRanges
      IEnumerable<TaskIdRange>
      IEnumerable(Of TaskIdRange)

      The list of task ranges that must complete before this task can be scheduled. null is treated as an empty list.

    Remarks

    This constructor provides the most general way of initializing a TaskDependencies object. In practice, most dependencies are on a single task, a list of task ids, or a single range of tasks. You can express these dependencies more clearly using OnId(String), OnIds(String[]), OnTasks(CloudTask[]), and OnIdRange(Int32, Int32) methods.
